text:
@CyrilRamaphosa Cyril you failed, you will go down as one of the worse president in history.

You initiated useless lockdown
You let army and police abuse blacks
Health system collapsed
Economy collapsed
Unemployment increased
You failed to respond to Covid19
You dig graves for citizens
